title: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: A classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water.
Beat eggs and mix with grated Parmesan.
Combine spaghetti with pancetta and remove from heat.
Quickly mix in the egg-cheese mixture and serve.

title: Chicken Curry
description: A flavorful curry with tender chicken pieces simmered in rich spices.
instructions: Add curry powder and stir for 1 minute.
Add chicken and cook until browned.
Add tomatoes and simmer for 5 minutes.
Pour in coconut milk and simmer until chicken is tender.
